message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes packed with features that are sure to enhance your experience. For this exceptional item, I am proposing a price of $150. This is an opportunity to get a high-quality product at a competitive price. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further or making a purchase.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the features you mentioned, but I'm looking to spend a bit less.  Would you be willing to consider $125 for the product?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget considerations. I would like to make a counteroffer of $140 for the product. This still allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while offering you a fair deal. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.
